reminder.content: I have really enjoyed speaking with you so many times today, but all the talking has made me pretty tired. I’m wiped out and need to recharge by taking a long nap. Let me get some shut eye, so I can be all refreshed and ready to chat with you again tomorrow. Good night!

ask to chat.content: Hello {'db': 'user name', 'default value': ''}! It's so {'var': 'great'} when we get a chance to {'var': 'chat'}. Can you confirm is this is a good time?

talk again later.content: Great, I can't wait to talk to you again then!

how do you feel about vision.content: How do you feel about your vision right now?

talk about frustrations.content: {'db': 'user name', 'default value': ''}, I know life is more challenging with your vision. Sometimes it helps to vent to someone who’s there to listen. Care to tell me about your frustrations?

did you use magnifier.content: Tell me, did you use your magnifier since the last time we spoke?

great to hear.content: That's {'var': 'great'} to hear. Tell me, did you use your magnifier since the last time we spoke?

keep trying.content: Your magnifier can make a huge difference when it’s tough to read something. Keep working with it and you’ll find it helpful.

how was magnifier use.content: Please share with me: how did it go with your magnifier?

excellent.content: Fantastic! I'm so proud of you for doing so well!

good.content: I am glad to hear it's going pretty well. Here's my advice: Let's aim to become great with your magnifier. I know that you can get there! Your future self will thank you.

fair.content: Let's see how we can make things better with practice. How about we pick a number of tries and do that many each day. Let's go for 2! It's not important that things go great each time, it's important that you give it a good try. How about that?

poor.content: I am so sorry that it has been hard to use the magnifier! It takes time to get better at it. Let's set a goal for tomorrow to just give it a try and not feel bad about however it goes. Each try counts, so you should feel good about trying.

prompted checkin.start_node_name: how do you feel about vision
